summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Mercer Street in The City of Seattle, from Belmont Avenue North to North Broadway, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 1438 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
